channel.title: How to change the client name and logging in box name?
channel.description: guys how can we change the top name of the client and the name where it says (name of the server) is loading...?? please can any1 help me !! thanks :D

item.source: How to change the client name and logging in box name?

item.title: How to change the client name and logging in box name?
item.dc:creator: @The_Provoked The Provoked
item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

Ok, download the java EV setter. here is the link, : http://www.mediafire.com/?mdwm2hjbolv

Now, click your start menu and search ‘variables’ then click on “edit the system environment variables” then click under the “Advanced” Tab, click “environment variables…” and delete the path you have now, NOT THE CLASSPATH, (and If you can’t delete it, delete as much as you can then put like 1 random letter or number.)

Ok, run the Java EV Setter as administrator and click where it says “search”, then go to “computer”, then “program files” then look for “java” then find your version of java jdk and double click it then click apply and you’re done!

Now, go back to the environment variables and go back to your path and erase the random letter or number you put in there and click ‘save’ or ‘apply’ (or whatever button is there) and ‘ok’ your way out of those windows. and then try running your compiler.

Hope this helped! any more questions, pm me!

Read full topic
item.source: How to change the client name and logging in box name?

item.title: How to change the client name and logging in box name?
item.dc:creator: @The_Provoked The Provoked
item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

Yeah, for the Frame title at the top of the client, (in the GUI.java)

public static String frameTitle = "(your server name) made by -(creator name)";

just basically, everywhere the old server name is, (search everywhere) then replace it with yours.
